body_html: If you say, "If your number is < x, change to x", it means "The number should be >= x" in common language. The current text is like saying, "No small dogs allowed" and being surprised when someone arrives with a large dog.
body_text: If you say, "If your number is < x, change to x", it means "The number should be >= x" in common language.  The current text is like saying, "No small dogs allowed" and being surprised when someone arrives with a large dog.
body: If you say, "If your number is `< x`, change to `x`", it means "The number should be `>= x`" in common language.  The current text is like saying, "No small dogs allowed" and being surprised when someone arrives with a large dog.
